label: B
sentence:
Which sentence is the effect of "The man uncovered incriminating evidence against his enemy."? Choose one between A and B.
A: The man avoided his enemy.
B: The man blackmailed his enemy.

label: B
sentence:
Which sentence is the cause of "The father put his daughter in her stroller."? Choose one between A and B.
A: She learned to walk.
B: He was tired of carrying her.

label: A
sentence:
Which sentence is the cause of "I drank from the water fountain."? Choose one between A and B.
A: I was thirsty.
B: I felt nauseous.

A: He wanted to shut off the alarm clock.
B: He wanted to iron his pants before work.

sentence:

A: The paperclip dropped from the magnet.
B: The paperclip stuck to the magnet.

A: It slowed to a stop.
